desc: We are committed to achieving the highest degree of customer satisfaction, among contractors and do-it-yourselfers (DIYs) alike, by carrying superior products and offering expert service delivered in a comfortable, "neighborhood store" environment.

layout.text: Complete your project with the help of
We don’t just sell paint, from in-store and in-home Color Consultations to Window Fashions, the Design Consultants at Regal Paint Centers have both your walls and windows covered!
